item.description:
We will *NOT* be in the back room, so check for us out in the main back section of the cafe. I'll have a ">H" sign on the table.

The defalt plan is more interesting conversation over dinner/coffee. However, if any of you have a specific topic you'd like to discuss let me know and/or just bring it up.

Default location of Trident Cafe, 7:30 April 12. Please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you.
item.name: The Boston Transhumanism April Meetup
